item.title: 📝 superwall/iOS-Backports (130 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: superwall

📝 Repository: superwall/iOS-Backports

📄 Descrizione: SwiftUI-Backports makes it easy to use the latest SwiftUI modifier, like those introduced in iOS 26, while still supporting older iOS versions. With a simple .backport modifier, you can write modern SwiftUI code without wrapping every new API in #available checks. It’s lightweight, drop-in ready, and keeps your UI code clean and future-proof.

⭐ Stelle: 130

🍴 Forks: 2

💻 Linguaggio: Swift

🏷️ Topics: backports ios ios18 ios26 swift swiftui

📜 Licenza: No license

⏰ Creato il: 2025-06-17T16:30:43Z

🔄 Ultimo Aggiornamento: 2025-07-14T02:23:50Z

Visita il Repository su GitHub

]]>
